headline: Right Wing Round-Up: Happy Easter, Maniacs
author: Kyle Mantyla
sentences:
David Edwards @ Raw Story: Trump issues bizarre ‘Happy Easter’ statement attacking ‘radical left maniacs.’
Jill Colvin and Julie Carr Smyth @ The Associated Press: Josh Mandel runs Ohio GOP Senate campaign ‘through churches.’
Jane Mayer @ The New Yorker: The Slime Machine Targeting Dozens of Biden Nominees.

Sarah Rumpf @ Mediaite: We Regret to Inform You That Tucker Carlson’s New Special Does In Fact Promote ‘Testicle Tanning.’
Dan Friedman @ Mother Jones: Far-Right Paramilitary Member Warned 1/6 Committee Witness Against Speaking Out.
David Badash @ The New Civil Rights Movement: Judge Rated ‘Unqualified’ Kills Mask Mandate for Planes and Trains After Lawsuit Against CDC Cited Panic Attacks.
Mary Papenfuss and Nina Golgowski @ HuffPost: Alex Jones’ InfoWars Files For Bankruptcy Following Sandy Hook Defeat.
